itunes:title: Talking Audiobooks & Elements of Craft with Katharine Lee McEwan
title: Talking Audiobooks & Elements of Craft with Katharine Lee McEwan
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with award-winning British actress, writer, and producer, Katharine Lee McEwan, about all things audiobooks — including producing your own — as well as: scriptwriting, narrative voice, tone, emotional impact, torturing your characters and incorporating humour.
content:encoded: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with award-winning British actress, writer, and producer, Katharine Lee McEwan, about all things audiobooks — including producing your own — as well as: scriptwriting, narrative voice, tone, emotional impact, torturing your characters and incorporating humour.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais and Katharine Lee McEwan
itunes:keywords: Bianca Marais, Katharine Lee McEwan, audiobooks, producing audiobooks, writing advice, publishing, narrative voice, tone, emotional impact, humour, characters
